title: Что-то положительное
overview: A dreamy high school student, Nastya, is going through all the difficulties of adolescence and escapes from problems by immersing herself in her fantasies. Her parents are busy with her older sister Angelina, who shows great promise, and her younger brother, whom they dote on. She is in love with the charismatic guy Mark, but he does not take her seriously, and even her best friend moves away from the girl. One day, Nastya discovers two stripes on a pregnancy test and realizes that this is a chance to get the long-awaited attention from others. After learning that the test was false, the girl is in no hurry to admit it to her loved ones, step by step plunging into an endless cycle of lies.
